line_1: Who swells each grievance, lengthens every tax,
line_2: Blind to the rip'ning vengeance of the axe.

line_1: My wheels, tho' old, are clogg'd with a new tax;
line_2: My oaks, tho' young, must groan beneath the axe:

line_1: For thee they Argo's Hulk will Tax,
line_2: And scrape her Pitchy Sides for Wax.
